categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Captain Mayfari was a Human male who served as Imperial soldier under the reconstituted Sith Empire. He was present in the Imperial Command Center on Ossus during the Empire's invasion of the planet.
Captain Mayfari serves as a reputation-vendor on the Imperial Side at Ossus within the game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne.
